headline: 10 Top Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) is a no-brainer stock for almost any portfolio, and even though it's already the second-largest company in the U.S. by sales, it has so much more potential.  It represents about 37% of all U.S. e-commerce and has 33% of the global cloud computing market, both of which make it unstoppable.  Sadly, I removed American Express (NYSE: AXP) from my list last year and lost out on its incredible gains in 2024.
